a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

span.p: Favorite Hobby or Past time: Archery, or painting
High School Honors and Activities: B honor roll for 5 semesters, 2 years track and volleyball, one year play
Best High School Memory: Going to Sky Zone for token party and after prom party
What Have you done at TD that you really enjoyed: Mrs. Brown’s business classes
What Have you Learned at TD that will help you in the future: Anything from Mrs. Brown’s business classes
Next year’s plans: take a year off then go to business school
Your Long Range Plans/Goals: My goal is to be president of a bank someday.
Best Advice Ever Given to You: Never give up and keep trying
Advice to Underclassmen: Try you best each year of high school no matter the situation. Just sit down and pay attention.

a.title: Go to comments for Senior Profiles

div.span: With schools closed until the end of May, we will be pushing back our prom date. Here are the dates depending on COVID shut-downs and strong hopes our kids will be able to have their prom :)

a.title: Go to comments for Prom Update 4-20-20

span.p: We are sorry to inform you all that due to the increasing COVID-19 recommendations, we will be closing the community wellness center in order to do our part to help flatten the curve of this virus. We apologize for the inconvience!!!

a.title: Go to comments for Wellness Center CLOSED

h2.span: A NOTE FROM OUR LIBRARIAN JOYCE MANN:
Remember students that you have access to ebooks and audiobooks through the school's OVERDRIVE account. You can access OVERDRIVE by going to the Tripp-Delmont

homepage, hover over the "Library" tab at the top of the page and click on OVERDRIVE. If you don't remember your username and password please email me at joyce.mann@k12.sd.us and I will get you that information. You also have access to many wonderful resources through the South Dakota State Library (link also under the Library tab) including BookFlix, World Book and SIRS Discover. Hope to see you all very soon!

span.h3: There are two apps available: Campus Student and Campus Parent. These apps provide real-time access to grades, assignments, attendance, schedules, announcements and more. Please contact the school for information.

ul.li: Blackboard Web Community Manager Privacy Policy (Updated) |
